item.name: View mailbox changes since last session
Show unseen threads containing a specific user

body.raw:
From: sir3.org@mydomain
To: testuser.org+dxdsdfa@mydomain
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/mixed;
        boundary="XXXXboundary text"

This is a multipart message in MIME format.

--XXXXboundary text
Content-Type: text/plain

Sample Body

--XXXXboundary text
Content-Type: text/plain;
Content-Disposition: attachment;
        filename="test.txt"

this is the attachment text

--XXXXboundary text--
